parameters.name: AddressColumn
parameters.description: The column that contains the email addresses in the file. The index starts from 1.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The name of the file that contains the list of email addresses.

parameters.name: FileUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the file that contains the list of email addresses.

parameters.name: HasHeaderRow
parameters.description: Specifies whether the first row is a table header.

parameters.name: RemoveDuplicate
parameters.description: Specifies whether to remove duplicate email addresses in the output file.
